Package core

Class FileReaderService

java.lang.Object
core.FileReaderService
public class FileReaderService
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the system functionality for reading test cases from files.

  • Method Details

    • readTestCases

      public java.lang.String[] readTestCases​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String delimiter) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      reads a test suite file located at filename into the passed DataRepresentation for later iteration over
      Parameters:
      filename - the test suite file containing test cases
      delimiter - the character(s)/pattern that separates each test case in the file
      Returns:
      the test cases formatted as DataRepresentation objects
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • readIntoDataRepresentation

      public DataRepresentation[] readIntoDataRepresentation​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String delimiter, DataRepresentation format) throws InvalidFormatException, java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.InstantiationException
      reads a test suite file located at filename into the passed DataRepresentation for later iteration over
      Parameters:
      filename - the test suite file containing test cases
      delimiter - the character(s)/pattern that separates each test case in the file
      format - the data representation that the test cases are read into
      Returns:
      the test cases formatted as DataRepresentation objects
      Throws:
      InvalidFormatException
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
      java.lang.InstantiationException

    • readConfig

      public Config readConfig​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      reads a configuration file from the passed filename
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the configuration file
      Returns:
      a Config object containing all the information from the configuration file
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown when passed filename can not be found
      java.io.IOException
